s0538: Tian clan finally had Qi state, became Qi Wei Wang, strong in the world.
s0539: Grand Historian says: I went to Qi, from Tai Shan to Langya, north covered by sea, fertile land two thousand li, its people broad-minded many concealed knowledge, their heavenly nature.
s0540: With Tai Gong's sageliness, established country foundation, Huan Gong's flourishing, repaired good government, made feudal lords assembled allied, called hegemon, not also proper?
